comments.text:
+MinecraftPE Tips en cuanto a la agresividad, eso es algo que se cambia 
poco a poco, con paciencia y amor. se le tiene que respetar al animal, se 
le tiene que coger con cariño y poco a poco acostumbrandolo. de por si el 
hamster es un animal timido, entonces costara mas. pero no es imposible:)
comments.author: CyPmascota

comments.text:
+MinecraftPE Tips Hola, el hamster puede viajar en avion, pero no todas las 
aerolineas transportan animales. Primero tendras que averiguar que 
aerolinias de tu pais lo hacen. Segundo, el hamster ha de tener una 
cartilla sellada por el veterinario conforme que no tiene enfermedades y ha 
sido desparasitado. Tercero, los de la aerolinea te explicaran que tipo de 
transportin necesitaras, ya que no lo podras llevar arriba, ira abajo con 
las maletas por el siguiente motivo: solo los perros, los gatos y los 
hurones se consideran animales de compania internacionalmente y solo estos 
pueden viajar arriba con los pasajeros. Una vez ya tengas claros todos 
estos puntos, podras viajar con el.
comments.author: CyPmascota

comments.text: hola no s e´puede

respuesta por favor ﻿

comments.text: ok gracias!!

comments.text:
+Chaera Park primero que tienes que considerar lo siguiente: si quieres 
viajar en avion con tu hamster, no lo podras llevar con tigo arriba, ya que 
no esta reconocido como mascota, tendra que ir abajo con las maletas. Si, 
se puede estresar bastante. No tanto como para morir, pero no es un viaje 
agradable.

top_comment.text:
Hola, aquí en la parte de mi país por lo menos donde yo vivo no se consigue 
NADA de lo que veo en tus videos (comida, champú, colonia, todo lo que eh 
visto en tus videos para hamsters), pues a mi hamster le pongo viruta de 
madera en su jaula en vez de diario prensado que tu le dices, le damos 
semillas o comida de conejo, o mezcla de semillas que te venden por "comida 
de hamster" que al parecer no lo es por lo que veo ahora, igual siempre le 
damos algunas verduras o frutas. Yo le pongo trozos de tela en vez de eso 
que le pones tu para que se acobijen y les de mas calorcito.. pero la 
verdad me preocupa si es que estoy criando bien o mal a mi hamster. Si es 
que está mal, hay alguna tienda online con envío a Córdoba-Argentina que me 
recomiendes para comprar todos estos productos que utilizas o porque cosas 
podría reemplazarlos? Mi hamster igual ya tiene dos años, me han dicho que 
no viven mucho más que eso pero quiero darle lo mejor hasta su último día! 
Desde ya, muchas gracias! ﻿
top_comment.author: Carlita Pinton

comments.text: Muchísimas gracias!
comments.author: Carlita Pinton

comments.text:

Un saludo y no te preocupes, estás cuidando muy bien de tu hamster!

Un Saludo﻿

Hola, nosotros antes de vender este producto lo hemos probado con miles de 
hamsters ( ya que somos el criadero mas grande de Europa de pequeños

es solo un mito urbano, pero nuestra experiencia con este producto ha sido 
maravillosa!

para poder ser fiel a el tienes que darle comida en la mano, puedes enpesar

unas 3 semanas puedes tomarlo si no te ase caso ve el video de VIDA PELUDA

captions.text: Subscribe to our english channel: Everything about your pet!
https://www.youtube.com/user/allaboutyourpet
Friends! You will see how I prepare some pet carriers because I'm goint to travel, I'm off to the beach...
and my hamsters are coming with me.
Well actually, I'm going to take the hamsters, my squirrel and also my
two degoes. I will put them in these pet carriers which are
totally perfect for the transport of these small pets.
The small mammals, are fine in
small pet carriers or small cages, they travel perfectly.
How will we do it? Look, its very easy.
You have seen how I get ready in other occasions and you know the
products. Naturlitter will go on the floor.
We will fill in generously so it absorbs all the pee's
and poo's pf these animals.
I will fill in all of them. This is like preparing a flowerpot.
Down here
the substrate.
Then a bit of Sweet Dreams, which is a substrate
that will make them be warm when travelling,
this also has great absorption
and they can make their bed with it
A little bit more here...
Great!!
Finally the hay.
The hay has two functions, if they are hungry, they can eat it, but it also helps them
to hide in it
We will be generous with the hay too.
Perfect!  All I have to do now is
put them into the cages,
the pet carriers. You can see they are quite full, just incase its a bumpy journey
and the car moves a lot.
By the way! the car is the worst way to travel with your pets, because
there are a lot of movements, you accelerate then have to brake, ...
But this is why I'm sure i fill in their cages,
all very soft and fluffy,
so they don't have any problem if we have to suddenly brake or there is any type of
accident.
Come on! First the hamsters into the small pet carrier.
Here they are!
In they go
we will give them
a bit of food,
just in case they feel hungry during the journey, but only a little, because normally when they travel,
they hardly eat anything.
I will pour some food and close the lid, make sure that its well
closed. You see!
They travel perfectly inside for a journey
that lasts three or four hours, even five.
Perfect! Hamsters done!
The second one is for
gerbos.
They will also travel in here.
The same, I fill in some food
but very little just in case they feel hungry during the journey, but this is
not so important.
You can give them a piece of fruit, a very small piece of fruit. Only because will not give them water
during the journey. Don't worry, they can stay three, four even five hours
without drinking,
No problem, as they are also animals of
dry climate, so nothing absolutely will happen to them.
But if you want, you can give them a
small piece of fruit,
because with the piece of fruit, they will have the necessary water intake.
Finally, we will put in
our squirrels.
Here I have a couple of korean squirrels.
I will place them in here, They were sleeping. It is
is good if you pick them up when they're sleeping, as they move much less.
We will give them a bit of squirrel food
just in case they are hungry.
It is important to give the squirrels a type of shelter, well squirrels,
hamsters and all type of animals any kind of shelter if you want.
Subject it well so they can make their bed and get inside, but as I've said in the beggining,
hay will help them hide and sleep inside. You see
how they hide
under the hay,
you can hardly tell they are there.
I'll put in their little shelter house
And we here have
the three pet carriers
ready for our holidays to the beach!

title: HÁMSTERS - Cómo viajar con mi hámster
